Author: daintyshardofglass
Text: This is some of the realest shit I’ve read all day, thank you for articulating it so well

Author: anrecovery
Text: it’s so crazy because we want to feel like people care about us, but constantly want to be isolated and alone and do thing on our own.  and then you feel like it’s your fault that no one reaches out to you because you’re constantly hiding away  but i think it’s really important to communicate these feelings to friends and family so that they know regardless of how distant you are, you still need constant reassurance and comfort and you don’t want to be distant, it’s just the disorder  hang in there, just try to communicate openly and hopefully you have a good support system that is there for you even when you isolate yourself
